Literal.msg: {0}: Assimp Mesh '{1}' has an invalid combination of Vertex Properties: '{2}', ignoring mesh

Literal.name: ASSIMP_NODE_NAME_EMPTY_ERR_MSG
Literal.msg: {0}: Assimp Node does not have a name, this node and all its children will be ignored. This can be a problem with the Assimp importer, please reported. Parent Node Name: '{1}'

Literal.name: ASSIMP_ANIM_NO_BONE_ERR_MSG
Literal.msg: {0}: Assimp Bone with name of '{1}' was not found, it was expected for an Animation Channel '{2}', of Animation '{3}', ignoring channel

Literal.name: ASSIMP_ANIM_PRE_STATE_ERR_MSG
Literal.msg: {0}: Assimp Pre-animation state is '{1}', in channel '{2}' in animation '{3}', which we currently do not support, defaulting to '{2}' state

Literal.name: ASSIMP_ANIM_POST_STATE_ERR_MSG
